name: lite-monitor
description: A event tracking library for Node.js and web browser

scripts.build:app: $npm_execpath workspace backend build && $npm_execpath workspace frontend build
scripts.build:demo: $npm_execpath workspace node-express-demo build && $npm_execpath workspace node-koa-demo build && $npm_execpath workspace web-react-demo build
scripts.build:lib: $npm_execpath workspace @lite-monitor/base build && $npm_execpath workspace @lite-monitor/node build && $npm_execpath workspace @lite-monitor/web build
scripts.dev:app: $npm_execpath workspace backend dev & $npm_execpath workspace frontend dev
scripts.publish:lib: $npm_execpath workspace @lite-monitor/base publish --access public && $npm_execpath workspace @lite-monitor/node publish --access public && $npm_execpath workspace @lite-monitor/web publish --access public
scripts.start:app: $npm_execpath workspace backend start && $npm_execpath workspace frontend start
